betterquesting:10.desc:8:
To farm bees you need to get bees. One way is to go steal them from villagers, but that won't get you nearly enough. Instead you'll need to find beehives throughout the world, once found you need to break them with the scoop. Before you scoop them you will want to right click on them with a bee smoker otherwise they will attack you, ignoring armor.

You'll probably want to make multiple scoops as they has low durability. While the smoker doesn't have durability.

Different biomes will give different bees which will want to live in biomes similar to their own. For example, desert bees will want to live in hot and dry biomes while meadows bees will want to live in temperate and mild biomes. But you can solve this with a habitat former.

There are also two special cases for getting bees. Valiant are a rare drop from breaking hives and Steadfast are found in dungeon chests.
